channel.title: Docs on Action Parameter Attributes
channel.description: Hello everyone. I've been looking for a comprehensive documentation of all action parameter attributes and their effect. So far I've found (from various sources) the following ones: `position` `required` `description` `type` `default` `immutable` `enum` Am I missing some? I think it would be nice to have a central documentation of those somewhere. [The docs](https://docs.stackstorm.com/actions.html#update-argument-parsing-in-the-script) cover `position`, but I haven't seen where the other attributes are defined and have so far not found a complete collection of them. I'd be happy to receive your input on this topic :)

item.title: Docs on Action Parameter Attributes
item.dc:creator: nschagen
item.description:
This is also something I’m missing. A reference guide for the core packs would be fantastic.

Read full topic

item.title: Docs on Action Parameter Attributes
item.dc:creator: cbg
item.description:
Hello everyone.
I’ve been looking for a comprehensive documentation of all action parameter attributes and their effect. So far I’ve found (from various sources) the following ones:
position
required
description
type
default
immutable
enum
Am I missing some?
I think it would be nice to have a central documentation of those somewhere. The docs cover position, but I haven’t seen where the other attributes are defined and have so far not found a complete collection of them.
I’d be happy to receive your input on this topic

Read full topic
